Hello! My name is Kate Frankland. and I am an Environmental Science student at UC Santa Barbara. I aim to pursue a career in corporate sustainability, contributing to developing solutions that will create positive environmental impacts while meeting business goals. I am interested in how technology and sustainable practices intersect and aim to further my skills in data analytics and geographic information systems (GIS).
